/food-101/images/ceviche/3127165.jpg			Ceviche, a traditional Latin American dish, features raw seafood (like shrimp or fish) marinated in citrus juices (such as lime or lemon), then combined with chopped vegetables (onions, cilantro, and green onions) and garnished with toasted corn kernels and a piece of avocado.
